Would anybody like to be a moderator on textadventures.co.uk?

Basically all this means at the moment is that you get to categorise the games. Games either go in the "Sandpit" if they're not a real game (we get quite a lot of test games set in a house... sigh), or they go into a proper category.

If you'd like to volunteer, please let me know and I'll give your account access.

Also if anyone has any feedback on the available categories, that would be great. I've just been through a load of games and ended up categorising them as "Mystery", when what we really need is a "Puzzle" category I suppose. Also I guess there should be an option for authors to suggest a category so that we don't have to work it out ourselves.
